config.customizations.name: Customizations
config.customizations.tips.addCustomizat:
Start by clicking the + sign below to add a Customization
Then click to expand the Customization and add Triggers, Conditions, and Actions for it
config.customizations.tips.lists: Lists like these can be used to add, remove, and rename sections
config.customizations.tips.customization: Each Customization needs at least 1 Trigger and 1 Action
config.customizations.triggers.name: Triggers
config.customizations.triggers.breakBloc: Triggers when a block is broken
config.customizations.triggers.killMob.t: Triggers when a mob is killed
Under what conditions should this Customization activate?
config.customizations.conditions.name: Conditions
Has a random chance to activate
config.customizations.actions.name: Actions
config.customizations.actions.consoleMes: Send a message in the console / logs
config.customizations.actions.serverComm: Send a command from the server
config.customizations.part.block.name: Block
config.customizations.part.block.tooltip: Block that this applies to; set to air to apply to all blocks
config.customizations.part.consoleMessag: Message that will be sent to the console / logs
config.customizations.part.random.name: Chance
config.customizations.part.random.toolti: % chance that this Customization will activate
config.customizations.part.serverCommand: Command that the server will send
